posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

// æŒ‰ç…§é”€é‡å€’åº ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æ’åº goodInfos.sort(Comparator.comparing(GoodInfo::getMonthCount).reversed()); å–æœ€å¤§å€¼/å–æœ€å°å€¼/æ±‚å’Œ12345678910111213141516List<GoodInfo> goodInfos = Arrays.asList();goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_1112312312", 199, 100000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_23534231231", 399, 10));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_412313123", 99, 10000000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_354532431", 599, 1));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_1423124131", 499, 10));// è·å–æœ€å¤§é”€é‡ æ³¨æ„å¦‚æœæ±‚æœ€å¤§å€¼æ˜¯åœ¨filterä¹‹åä½¿ç”¨ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼ŒgoodInfos.stream().filter().maxä¸€å®šè¦åˆ¤æ–­filteråé›†åˆæ•°é‡æ˜¯å¦ä¸ä¸ºç©ºï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä½¿ç”¨maxçš„getæ–¹æ³•ä¼šæŠ¥é”™GoodInfo hotGoodInfo = goodInfos.stream().max(Comparator.comparing(GoodInfo::getMonthCount)).get();// æ±‚æœ€ä½ä»·æ ¼å•†å“GoodInfo lowPriceGoodInfo = goodInfos.stream().min(Comparator.comparing(GoodInfo::getMonthCount)).get();// è®¡ç®—å•†å“æ€»ä»·æ ¼int sum = goodInfos.stream().mapToInt(person -> person.getPrice()).sum();// æ±‚å¹³å‡ä»·æ ¼double avg = goodInfos.stream().mapToInt(person -> person.getPrice()).average().getAsDouble(); }); å®ä½“é›†åˆ è½¬ å•ä¸ªå±æ€§çš„é›†åˆå¾€å¾€åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä¼šæœ‰è¿™æ ·çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼šæˆ‘éœ€è¦æå–é›†åˆä¸­æŸä¸€ä¸ªå±æ€§ï¼Œç„¶åç»„è£…æˆé›†åˆï¼Œé€šå¸¸åšæ³•æ˜¯å…ˆåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²é›†åˆï¼Œç„¶åéå†åŸå§‹é›†åˆï¼Œå–å‡ºæ•°æ®ï¼Œæ”¾åˆ°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²é›†åˆä¸­ï¼Œè™½ç„¶ä¹Ÿèƒ½å®ç°åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸å…å¤ªè¿‡äºç¹çï¼Œç°åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€è¡Œ lambada è¡¨è¾¾å¼å³å¯æå®šï¼š 12345678910List<GoodInfo> goodInfos = Arrays.asList();goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_1112312312", 199, 100000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_23534231231", 399, 10));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_412313123", 99, 10000000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_354532431", 599, 1));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_1423124131", 499, 10));// å°†listè½¬ä¸ºæŸä¸ªå±æ€§map è¿™é‡Œæ˜¯æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰skunoå…¨éƒ¨å–å‡ºæ¥ ä½œä¸ºé›†åˆList<String> skuNos = goodInfos.stream().map(goodInfo -> goodInfo.getSkuNo()).collect(Collectors.toList()); å®ä½“é›†åˆ è½¬ map è¿”å›12345678910List<GoodInfo> goodInfos = Arrays.asList();goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_1112312312", 199, 100000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_23534231231", 399, 10));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_412313123", 99, 10000000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_354532431", 599, 1));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_1423124131", 499, 10));// å°†listè½¬ä¸ºmapï¼Œkey ä¸ºå•†å“idMap<String, GoodInfo> map = goodInfos.stream().collect(Collectors.toMap(GoodInfo::getSkuNo, goodInfo -> goodInfo)); å®ä½“é›†åˆæŒ‰ç…§æŸä¸ªå±æ€§åˆ†ç»„12345678910List<GoodInfo> goodInfos = Arrays.asList();goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_1112312312", 199, 100000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_23534231231", 399, 10));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_412313123", 99, 10000000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_354532431", 599, 1));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_1423124131", 499, 10));// æŒ‰ç…§å•†å“æ¥æºåˆ†ç»„Map<String, List<GoodInfo>> map = goodInfos.stream().collect(Collectors.groupingBy(GoodInfo::getMallSource)); è¿‡æ»¤æ•°æ®ï¼ˆè®°å¾—æ¥æ”¶ï¼‰12345678910111213141516171819List<GoodInfo> goodInfos = Arrays.asList();goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_1112312312", 199, 100000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_23534231231", 399, 10));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_412313123", 99, 10000000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_354532431", 599, 1));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_1423124131", 499, 10));// è¿‡æ»¤å•†å“ä»·æ ¼å¤§äº300çš„// todo è¿‡æ»¤åä¸€å®šè¦ä½¿ç”¨é›†åˆæ¥æ”¶ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç­‰äºæ²¡æœ‰è¿‡æ»¤List<GoodInfo> collect = goodInfos.stream() .filter(goodInfo -> goodInfo.getPrice() > 300) .collect(Collectors.toList());collect.forEach( goodInfo -> { System.out.println(goodInfo.getPrice()); }); å»é‡(ä¸¤ç§æ–¹æ³•å¯é€‰)æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ set å»é‡1234567891011121314151617List<GoodInfo> goodInfos = Arrays.asList();goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_1112312312", 199, 100000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_23534231231", 399, 10));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_412313123", 99, 10000000));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_354532431", 599, 1));goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_1423124131", 499, 10));// ä½¿ç”¨treeset é›†åˆæ¥å®ç°å»é‡ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œä¸€å®šè¦ä½¿ç”¨é›†åˆæ¥æ”¶ï¼Œä¸ç„¶ç­‰äºæ²¡æœ‰å»é‡List<GoodInfo> goodInfos1 = goodInfos.stream() .collect( Collectors.collectingAndThen( Collectors.toCollection( () -> new TreeSet<>(Comparator.comparing(o -> o.getSkuNo()))), ArrayList::new)); æ–¹æ³•äºŒ map å»é‡123456789101112131415161718192021public static void main(String[] args) { List<GoodInfo> goodInfos = Arrays.asList(); goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_1112312312", 199, 100000)); goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("tb", "tb_23534231231", 399, 10)); goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100)); goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_1110080098", 299, 100)); goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("jd", "jd_412313123", 99, 10000000)); goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_354532431", 599, 1)); goodInfos.add(new GoodInfo("pdd", "pdd_1423124131", 499, 10)); // ä½¿ç”¨mapå»é‡ List<GoodInfo> goodInfos2 = goodInfos.stream() .filter(distinctByKey(goodInfo -> goodInfo.getSkuNo())) .collect(Collectors.toList()); } public static <T> Predicate<T> distinctByKey(Function<? super T, ?> keyExtractor) { Map<Object, Boolean> seen = new ConcurrentHashMap<>(); return t -> seen.putIfAbsent(keyExtractor.apply(t), Boolean.TRUE) == null; } é‡åˆ°çš„å‘å‘ä¸€ æŠ¥é”™ä¿¡æ¯ï¼šjava.util.NoSuchElementException: No value present è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼šä¸€èˆ¬å‡ºç°è¿™ä¸ªé”™éƒ½æ˜¯åœ¨ filter æ“ä½œåé¢ä½¿ç”¨äº† max/min ç­‰æ“ä½œï¼Œç„¶åè°ƒç”¨äº† get æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå–ä¸åˆ°æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æŠ¥é”™ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å»ºè®®æ£€æŸ¥ filter æ“ä½œåæ—¶å€™è¿˜æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼Œæœ‰æ•°æ®å†è¿›è¡Œåç»­æ“ä½œï¼š 1234 Optional<User> optional = goodInfos.stream().max(userComparator);if(optional != null && optional.isPresent()) { recentUserServer = optional.get().getServer();} å‘äºŒ ä½¿ç”¨äº† filter ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ²¡èµ·ä½œç”¨å‘¢ï¼Ÿ è°ƒç”¨ filter ä¹‹åï¼Œå®ƒæ˜¯æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä½ éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„é›†åˆå»æ¥æ”¶ ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ åç»­æ…¢æ…¢å¡«å‘
